tab-5-title: Record the download of streaming TV schedules
tab-9-text: The user manual is available in various formats, accessible from the terminal or from a web browser.
tab-9-link-report: Send a message or report a bug
tab-10-text: Do you really want to close all and shutdown the server?
button-error: An error has occurred by clicking the button '$1'
delete-download-tooltip: Warning! This action deletes the file downloaded. Are you sure?
delete-queue-tooltip: Warning! This action deletes the entire queue. Are you sure?
downloads-completed-cleaned: Cleaned progressbar nad info of completed downloads
get-IP-failure: Unable to get the IP address
links-edited: Edited the list of links in the queue
links-edited-incorrect: A link in the queue is not correct: $1
livestream-scheduled-failure: Livestream - The scheduled download could not be saved
modem-reconnection-failure: Reconnection failure. Command for modem reconnection not found
play-playlist-audio-not-played: The playlist contains audio files that cannot be played beacause they are not found ($1)
play-playlist-no-audio: Playlist do not contains audio files
play-playlist-audio-not-found: Unable to play the playlist. No audio files was found
play-playlist-empty: Unable to play an empty playlist
play-playlist-player-unfit: To play all audio files in the playlist require to set cvlc, mpv or mplayer as media player
player-not-configured: The media player has not been configured
player-not-found: The configured media player does not seem to be present in the system
playlist-video-to-audio-not-found: Unable to extract audio from video $1 (not found)
playlist-video-ffmpeg-not-found: Audio extraction requires ffmpeg which is not found on your system
reconnecter-not-configured: You have not yet configured ZDL for automatic modem reconnection
select-error: An error occurred selecting an option (selectMenuHandler: $1)
set-language: Switched to a new language. Client language is: $1
set-auto-update: Set a new value for automatic updates: $1
set-file-overwrite: Set a new value for file overwriting: $1
set-zdl-start-mode: Set a new value for ZDL start mode: $1
set-axel-parts: Set the number of Axel download parts: $1
set-aria2-connections: Set the number of Aria2 connections: $1
set-max-dl: Set the limit for parallel downloads: $1
set-tcp-port: Set the TCP port for torrents: $1
set-udp-port: Set the UDP port for torrents: $1
set-socket-port: Set default TCP port for sockets: $1
set-editor: Set the default editor for text files: $1
set-player: Set the default player for audio/video files: $1
set-reconnecter: Set the command for modem/router reconnection: $1
set-path-launcher: Set the path for the launcher command: $1
set-local-downloader: Set the downloder inside this path: $1
set-local-max-dl: Set the limit for parallel downloads inside this path: $1
set-modem-reconnection: Set a new value for modem reconnection: $1
set-slider-error: An error occurred setting a slider range (slidersSetRange: $1)
set-spinner-error: An error occurred setting a spinner range (spinnersSetRange: $1)
socket-port-unavailable: The port $1 is not available for a new socket
start-locale: Localized strings loaded. Client language is: $1
xdcc-incorrect: The XDCC command added is not correct: $1
xdcc-search-error: Error parsing response in xdcc search: $1
xdcc-search-no-term: enter one or more search terms!
zdl-shutdown:
All ZDL instances have been closed.
The server is stopped.
zdl-killed: ZDL and downloads inside path terminated
